title: Rep. Cori Bush
description: Samantha Bee sits down with Congresswoman Cori Bush to discuss experiencing an insurrection three days into a new job, why Democrats so often need to be the adults in the room, and how thrifting is good for your look and the environment!
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
